AboutScreen.title: {CART_ICON} About this tool
AboutScreen.prompt: {RIGHT_ARROW} Use {LEFT_BUTTON}{RIGHT_BUTTON} to scroll. Press {START_BUTTON} to go back.

startupWorker.initIDE:
Initializing IDE devices...
Do not turn off the 573.
startupWorker.initFAT:
Attempting to mount FAT filesystem...
Do not turn off the 573.

cartDetectWorker.readCart:
Reading security cartridge...
Do not turn off the 573.

cartEraseWorker.erase:
Erasing cartridge...
Do not turn off the 573.
cartEraseWorker.error:
An error occurred while erasing the cartridge's EEPROM. The unlocking key may or may not have been successfully changed.

Press the Test button to view debug logs.

cartReflashWorker.setDataKey:
Setting new unlocking key...
Do not turn off the 573.
cartReflashWorker.write:
Writing new data to cartridge...
Do not turn off the 573.
cartReflashWorker.idError: The selected game is not compatible with the currently inserted cartridge, as it requires one with a valid DS2401 identifier.
cartReflashWorker.writeError:
An error occurred while reflashing the cartridge. The unlocking key may or may not have been successfully changed.

Press the Test button to view debug logs.

cartUnlockWorker.read:
Dumping cartridge...
Do not turn off the 573.

cartWriteWorker.write:
Writing new data to cartridge...
Do not turn off the 573.
cartWriteWorker.error:
An error occurred while writing to the cartridge's EEPROM.

Press the Test button to view debug logs.

cartDumpWorker.save:
Saving cartridge dump...
Do not turn off the 573.
cartDumpWorker.success: A dump of the cartridge and all its identifiers has been saved as %s in the root of the drive. The dump can be decoded and viewed using the decodeDump.py script provided with this tool.
cartDumpWorker.error:
An error occurred while saving the dump to the hard drive. Turn off the system and make sure the drive is connected to the IDE bus properly, set as secondary and formatted with a single FAT16, FAT32 or exFAT partition.

Press the Test button to view debug logs.

romDumpWorker.init:
Creating dump directory...
Do not turn off the 573.
romDumpWorker.dumpBIOS:
Dumping BIOS ROM...
Do not turn off the 573.
romDumpWorker.dumpRTC:
Dumping RTC RAM...
Do not turn off the 573.
romDumpWorker.dumpFlash:
Dumping internal flash...
Do not turn off the 573.
romDumpWorker.dumpPCMCIA1:
Dumping PCMCIA card in slot 1...
Do not turn off the 573.
romDumpWorker.dumpPCMCIA2:
Dumping PCMCIA card in slot 2...
Do not turn off the 573.
romDumpWorker.success: All dumps have been saved to the %s directory in the root of the drive.
romDumpWorker.initError:
An error occurred while creating the dump directory. Turn off the system and make sure the drive is connected to the IDE bus properly, set as secondary and formatted with a single FAT16, FAT32 or exFAT partition.

Press the Test button to view debug logs.
romDumpWorker.dumpError:
An error occurred while writing dumps to the hard drive. Ensure the drive has at least 32 MB of free space (256 MB if both PCMCIA cards are inserted) and the filesystem is not damaged.

Press the Test button to view debug logs.

atapiEjectWorker.success:
The drive's tray has been opened.

You may safely remove or replace the disc and close the tray. All data has been loaded into RAM and the tool will keep running until the 573 is turned off.
atapiEjectWorker.atapiError:
The drive currently configured as primary on the IDE bus is not an ATAPI CD-ROM drive and does not support ejecting.

Press the Test button to view debug logs.
atapiEjectWorker.ejectError:
Failed to open the drive's tray. Your drive might be incompatible with the ATAPI driver used by this tool.

Press the Test button to view debug logs.

ButtonMappingScreen.title: {CART_ICON} Select button mapping
ButtonMappingScreen.prompt: Use {START_BUTTON} or the Test button to select a mapping preset suitable for your cabinet or JAMMA setup. Other buttons will be enabled once a mapping is selected.
ButtonMappingScreen.itemPrompt: {RIGHT_ARROW} Press and hold {START_BUTTON} or Test to confirm

CartActionsScreen.title: {CART_ICON} Cartridge options
CartActionsScreen.itemPrompt: {RIGHT_ARROW} Press {START_BUTTON} to select, hold {LEFT_BUTTON}{RIGHT_BUTTON} + {START_BUTTON} to go back

qrDump.name: Dump cartridge as QR code
qrDump.prompt: Generate a QR code encoding the contents of the cartridge's EEPROM in compressed format. The code can be scanned and decoded to a raw dump.

hddDump.name: Dump cartridge to hard drive
hddDump.prompt: Save the contents of the cartridge's EEPROM to a file on the IDE hard drive or CF card connected as secondary drive (if any).

hexdump.name: View cartridge hexdump
hexdump.prompt: Display the raw contents of the cartridge's EEPROM in hexadecimal format.

resetSystemID.name: Reset system identifier (unpair cartridge)
resetSystemID.prompt: Delete any previously saved system identifier, allowing the cartridge to be used to reinstall the game on any system.
resetSystemID.confirm:
The system identifier will be cleared, allowing the cartridge to be used on a system with any digital I/O board. The game will have to be reinstalled in order to pair the cartridge to the new board.

Do you wish to proceed?
resetSystemID.error: The system identifier is not present or has already been cleared on this cartridge.

matchSystemID.name: Copy system identifier (pair to this system)
matchSystemID.prompt: Set the saved system identifier to allow the cartridge to be used on this system without having to reinstall the game first.
matchSystemID.confirm:
The system identifier will be changed, allowing the cartridge to be used on this system. If already installed here, the game will not have to be reinstalled.

Do you wish to proceed?
matchSystemID.error: No digital I/O board found. Copying the system identifier requires a digital I/O board to be installed in this system.

editSystemID.name: Edit system identifier (pair to another I/O board)
editSystemID.prompt: Edit the saved system identifier to allow the cartridge to be used on a specific system without having to reinstall the game first.
editSystemID.confirm:
The system identifier will be changed, allowing the cartridge to be used on the respective system. If already installed on the new system, the game will not have to be reinstalled.

Do you wish to proceed?
editSystemID.error: The system identifier entered is invalid. Make sure all digits are correct and try again.

reflash.name: Erase and convert cartridge to another game
reflash.prompt: Wipe all data and flash the cartridge with another game's identifiers. All cartridges can be converted for use with any other game that uses the same cartridge type.
reflash.confirm:
The contents of the cartridge's EEPROM will be replaced, the system identifier (if any) will be cleared and the unlocking key will be updated to match the new game.

Do you wish to proceed?

erase.name: Erase cartridge
erase.prompt: Wipe all data including game identifiers. Erased cartridges can be flashed for use with games unsupported by this tool using a master calendar.
erase.confirm:
The contents of the cartridge's EEPROM will be erased, making it unusable until reflashed and resetting the unlocking key to 00-00-00-00-00-00-00-00. The cartridge ID will not be altered.

Do you wish to proceed?

CartInfoScreen.title: {CART_ICON} Cartridge information
CartInfoScreen.digitalIOInfo:
Digital I/O ID:	%s
Digital I/O SN:	%s
CartInfoScreen.cartInfo:
Cartridge type:	%s
Unlock status:	%s
DS2401 identifier:	%s
ZS01 identifier:	%s
Configuration:	%s

pairing.unsupported: This game does not pair to I/O boards
pairing.unknown: Unlock required to view pairing status
pairing.unpaired: Not paired to any digital I/O board
pairing.thisSystem: Paired to this system's I/O board

description.noCart:
No supported cartridge has been found.

Turn off the system and insert a security cartridge in order to continue. DO NOT HOTPLUG CARTRIDGES; hotplugging may damage both the 573 and the cartridge.

If a cartridge is inserted but not detected, try cleaning its pins as well as the system's security cartridge connector.

Press the Test button to view debug logs.
description.initError:
Failed to initialize and read unprotected data from this cartridge.

Turn off the system and make sure the cartridge is inserted correctly. If this issue persists, try using another cartridge of the same type.

locked.unidentified:
This cartridge contains data for an unsupported game.

As the cartridge is currently locked, you will have to manually select which game it belongs to in order to dump its contents or reflash it for use with a supported game, as each game has a different unlocking key.
locked.identified:
This cartridge has been identified as:
  %s
  %s

If this is correct, you may proceed to unlock the cartridge using the appropriate key for this game in order to access and modify its contents.
locked.unknown:
This cartridge cannot be identified without unlocking it first.

You will have to manually select which game it belongs to in order to dump its contents or reflash it for use with a supported game, as each game has a different unlocking key.

unlocked.unidentified:
This cartridge contains data for an unsupported game.

The system identifier (if any) cannot be reset or edited, however you may still dump the cartridge's contents or reflash it for use with a supported game.
unlocked.identified:
This cartridge has been identified as:
  %s
  %s

You may now proceed to reset the system identifier, edit it or erase and reflash the cartridge for use with another game.
unlocked.blank:
This cartridge has been previously erased and is now blank.

It must be flashed and optionally initialized with a system identifier in order to be used with a supported game.

prompt.locked: {RIGHT_ARROW} Press {START_BUTTON} to unlock, hold {LEFT_BUTTON}{RIGHT_BUTTON} + {START_BUTTON} to go back.
prompt.unlocked: {RIGHT_ARROW} Press {START_BUTTON} to continue, hold {LEFT_BUTTON}{RIGHT_BUTTON} + {START_BUTTON} to go back.

x76f041.name: {CHIP_ICON} Xicor X76F041
x76f041.warning:
X76F041 cartridges keep track of how many times a wrong key has been used. If too many unlock attempts fail, they will lock out any further access and thus become PERMANENTLY BRICKED, with no way to restore access.

Are you sure the key is correct?
x76f041.error:
An error occurred while attempting to unlock the cartridge; the key is probably incorrect. If you are sure you selected the proper key, the maximum allowed number of failed unlocking attempts may have been exceeded (and thus the cartridge may have been bricked).

Press the Test button to view debug logs.

x76f100.name: {CHIP_ICON} Xicor X76F100
x76f100.warning:
X76F100 cartridges keep track of how many times a wrong key has been used. If too many unlock attempts fail, the cartridge will self-erase and will have to be reinitialized to factory data and paired to the system again if the game requires it.

Are you sure the key is correct?
x76f100.error:
An error occurred while attempting to unlock the cartridge; the key is probably incorrect. If you are sure you selected the proper key, the cartridge may have self-erased and reset the key to a null key due to too many failed unlocking attempts.

Press the Test button to view debug logs.

zs01.name: {CHIP_ICON} Konami ZS01 (PIC16CE625)
zs01.warning:
ZS01 cartridges keep track of how many times a wrong key has been used. If too many unlock attempts fail, the cartridge will self-erase and will have to be reinitialized to factory data and paired to the system again if the game requires it.

Are you sure the key is correct?
zs01.error:
An error occurred while attempting to unlock the cartridge; the key is probably incorrect. If you are sure you selected the proper key, the cartridge may have self-erased and reset the key to a null key due to too many failed unlocking attempts.

Press the Test button to view debug logs.

HexdumpScreen.title: {CART_ICON} Cartridge dump
HexdumpScreen.prompt: {RIGHT_ARROW} Use {LEFT_BUTTON}{RIGHT_BUTTON} to scroll. Press {START_BUTTON} to go back.

KeyEntryScreen.title: Enter unlocking key
KeyEntryScreen.body:
Enter the 8-byte key this cartridge was last locked with.

Use {LEFT_BUTTON}{RIGHT_BUTTON} to move between digits, hold {START_BUTTON} and use {LEFT_BUTTON}{RIGHT_BUTTON} to edit the highlighted digit.

MainMenuScreen.title: {CART_ICON} Main menu
MainMenuScreen.itemPrompt: {RIGHT_ARROW} Use {LEFT_BUTTON}{RIGHT_BUTTON} to move, select by pressing {START_BUTTON}

cartInfo.name: Manage security cartridge
cartInfo.prompt: Display information about, unlock, dump and manipulate the contents of the inserted security cartridge (if any).

dump.name: Dump flash, PCMCIA cards, RTC and BIOS ROM
dump.prompt: Dump the contents of the internal ROMs and PCMCIA cards to the IDE hard drive or CF card connected as secondary drive (if any).
dump.confirm:
The contents of the internal flash memory, RTC RAM, BIOS ROM and any inserted PCMCIA flash cards will be dumped and the dumps saved to a new directory in the root of the hard drive or CF card currently configured as secondary on the IDE bus.

Do you wish to proceed?

restore.name: Restore flash, PCMCIA cards or RTC from dump
restore.prompt: Restore the contents of the internal ROMs or any PCMCIA cards from the IDE hard drive or CF card connected as secondary drive (if any).

about.name: About this tool
about.prompt: View information about this tool, including open source licenses.

ejectCD.name: Eject CD-ROM
ejectCD.prompt: Open the CD-ROM drive's tray. You may use this option if the drive's eject button is not easily accessible on your 573.

reboot.name: Reboot system
reboot.prompt: Restart the system. Swap out the CD-ROM and toggle DIP switch 4 before selecting this option to boot the installed game.

QRCodeScreen.title: {CART_ICON} Cartridge dump
QRCodeScreen.prompt: Scan this code and paste the resulting string into the decodeDump.py script provided alongside this tool to obtain a dump of the cartridge. Press {START_BUTTON} to go back.

ReflashGameScreen.title: {CART_ICON} Select game to convert cartridge to
ReflashGameScreen.prompt: Make sure you select the correct region. Note that cartridges can only be converted for use with games that accept the same cartridge type.
ReflashGameScreen.itemPrompt: {RIGHT_ARROW} Press {START_BUTTON} to select, hold {LEFT_BUTTON}{RIGHT_BUTTON} + {START_BUTTON} to go back

SystemIDEntryScreen.title: Edit system identifier
SystemIDEntryScreen.body:
Enter the new digital I/O board's identifier. To obtain the ID of another board, run this tool on its respective system.

Use {LEFT_BUTTON}{RIGHT_BUTTON} to move between digits, hold {START_BUTTON} and use {LEFT_BUTTON}{RIGHT_BUTTON} to edit the highlighted digit.

SystemInfoScreen.title: System information
SystemInfoScreen.prompt: {RIGHT_ARROW} Use {LEFT_BUTTON}{RIGHT_BUTTON} to scroll. Press {START_BUTTON} to go back.

UnlockKeyScreen.title: {CART_ICON} Select unlocking key
UnlockKeyScreen.prompt: If the cartridge has been converted before, select the game it was last converted to. If it is currently blank, select 00-00-00-00-00-00-00-00.
UnlockKeyScreen.itemPrompt: {RIGHT_ARROW} Press {START_BUTTON} to select, hold {LEFT_BUTTON}{RIGHT_BUTTON} + {START_BUTTON} to go back

WarningScreen.title: Warning
WarningScreen.body:
This tool is experimental and provided with no warranty whatsoever. It is not guaranteed to work and improper usage may PERMANENTLY BRICK your System 573 security cartridges.

Use this tool at your own risk. Do not proceed if you do not know what you are doing.
